languages.text: "Багрянец и золото пылают в твоей душе кровавым закатом. Но остальные краски... выцвели".
"A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."
languages.original_text: "Багрянец и золото пылают в твоей душе кровавым закатом. Но остальные краски... выцвели".

traits.locale_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns in your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded away."

"A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."

languages.text: "Ein blutgetränkter Sonnenuntergang aus Gold und Rot brennt in Eurer Seele. Doch Eure übrigen Farben ... sind zu Grau verblasst."
languages.original_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."

traits.locale_text: "Ein blutgetränkter Sonnenuntergang aus Gold und Rot brennt in Eurer Seele. Doch Eure übrigen Farben ... sind zu Grau verblasst."

languages.text: « Un crépuscule sanglant d'or et d'écarlate brûle en votre âme, mais de vos autres couleurs ne reste plus... qu'un camaïeu de gris. »
languages.original_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."

traits.locale_text: « Un crépuscule sanglant d'or et d'écarlate brûle en votre âme, mais de vos autres couleurs ne reste plus... qu'un camaïeu de gris. »

languages.text: «Un ocaso sangriento de dorado y escarlata arde en su alma. Pero de sus otros colores... solo queda gris».
languages.original_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."

traits.locale_text: «Un ocaso sangriento de dorado y escarlata arde en su alma. Pero de sus otros colores... solo queda gris».

languages.text: 「金と深紅の血に染まった夕日が、あなたの魂の中で燃えています。でも、あなたの残りの色は…灰色にあせてしまいました」
languages.original_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."

traits.locale_text: 「金と深紅の血に染まった夕日が、あなたの魂の中で燃えています。でも、あなたの残りの色は…灰色にあせてしまいました」

languages.text: “你的灵魂燃烧着金色与深红色，仿佛浸透了鲜血的残阳，但剩下的一切……都变成了灰色。”
languages.original_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."

traits.locale_text: “你的灵魂燃烧着金色与深红色，仿佛浸透了鲜血的残阳，但剩下的一切……都变成了灰色。”

languages.original_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."

languages.text: "Altın ve kızıl renklerdeki, kana bulanmış bir gün batımı; ruhunun derinliklerinde yanıyor. Geri kalan renkler ise... Solup griye dönmüş."
languages.original_text: "A blood-soaked sunset of gold and crimson burns within your soul. But the rest of your colours... have faded to grey."
